FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about Realtime Solutions system.
FAQ.q1: Do I need to invest in a physical server at the office to use the system?
FAQ.a1: No. The Realtime system is built on a centralized cloud computing model, helping businesses optimize initial investment costs. You only need an Internet connection and flexible devices like IP Phones, Softphones on computers, or analog phones via IP Gateways.
FAQ.q2: If my company expands personnel, is upgrading complicated?
FAQ.a2: Completely simple. The system architecture is designed to be ready for expansion at any time. You just need to upgrade the service package according to user "Blocks" (like Block 10, Block 20...) to increase the number of extensions without changing the existing technical infrastructure.
FAQ.q3: Can employees use the PBX if they work remotely or go on business trips?
FAQ.a3: Yes. The system supports multiple platforms (Web, Mobile App, Softphone). Employees can log in and make/receive calls, and take care of customers anywhere as long as there is an Internet connection.
FAQ.q4: Is it easy to listen to old calls to check service quality?
FAQ.a4: Very easy. The system automatically records and stores call history. Managers can search, playback, or download recording files right on the management web browser.
FAQ.q5: Does the system support automatic OTP reading or debt reminders by voice?
FAQ.a5: Yes. With integrated Text-To-Speech and Auto Call solutions, the system can automatically make calls to read OTPs, announce balances, remind appointments, or remind debts completely automatically with natural AI voices.

Navbar.prod_vas_desc: Telesales numbers, landline, mobile, SMS, ZNS...

About.slide1_desc: Solution to make thousands of calls per hour completely automatically. Optimized for Telesales campaigns, Debt collection, Market surveys, or OTP notifications.
About.slide2_desc: The system automatically dials ahead and only transfers calls to agents when a customer answers. Completely eliminates waiting time for ringtones, busy signals, or unreachable numbers.
About.slide3_desc: Convert text to natural Vietnamese AI voice (North/South) in real-time. Personalize greetings: 'Hello Mr. Nam', 'Hello Ms. Lan' automatically.
About.slide4_desc: Automatically detect and remove invalid phone numbers, virtual numbers, or numbers in the Do Not Call (DNC) list.

Page.feat_schedule_desc: Set campaign start and end times. The system automatically runs during golden hours to increase pickup rates.
Page.feat_tts_desc: AI Voice technology converts text to natural speech, allowing personalization of customer names, debt amounts, or OTP codes.
Page.feat_import_desc: Upload customer lists from Excel files or sync directly from CRM in seconds.
Page.feat_report_desc: Statistics on call status (answered, busy, wrong number), call duration, and detailed reports to evaluate effectiveness.
Page.feat_dtmf_desc: Allows customers to press keys to interact (e.g., Press 1 to meet an agent, Press 2 to replay information).
Page.feat_filter_desc: Automatically detect non-existent numbers, invalid subscribers, or numbers in the Blacklist to save costs.
Page.features_desc: Free staff from boring manual dialing. Focus on closing deals.
Page.stats_desc: With Predictive Dialing technology, your agents only spend time talking to real customers.

About.slide1_desc: Providing professional Inbound and Outbound Telesales personnel. Helps businesses cut 40% of recruitment, training, and operational management costs.
About.slide2_desc: Team of agents receiving calls, answering queries, and handling customer complaints 24/7/365. Ensuring Pickup Rate always above 95%.
About.slide3_desc: Deploy outbound campaigns for sales, product introduction, debt collection, or customer satisfaction survey (CSAT) with tailored scripts.
About.slide4_desc: Strict quality assurance (QA) system. Personnel are well-trained in voice skills, situational handling, and product knowledge before taking on projects.

Page.feat_staff_desc: Agents are carefully selected, with standard regional voices and practical experience in many fields.
Page.feat_training_desc: In-depth professional and soft skills training process before starting the project. Weekly knowledge updates.
Page.feat_qa_desc: QA team listens to recordings, scores, and provides 1-1 coaching to ensure script compliance and service attitude.
Page.feat_scale_desc: Easily scale up/down the number of personnel according to seasonality or marketing campaigns.
Page.feat_report_desc: Provide detailed performance reports (KPIs) by day/week/month: Call volume, conversion rate, AHT, CSAT...
Page.feat_cost_desc: No costs for recruitment, insurance, office rental, or equipment procurement (computers/headsets).
Page.features_desc: We provide comprehensive personnel solutions, helping you focus on your core business.
Page.stats_desc: International standard process system with experienced personnel.

About.slide1_desc: Providing high-performance Cloud Server on KVM/VMware virtualization platform. Service initialization in just 30 seconds with the most powerful hardware infrastructure.
About.slide2_desc: Equipped with 100% NVMe Enterprise SSDs for superior read/write speeds (IOPS) 10 times faster than regular SSDs. New generation Intel Xeon Gold CPUs handle multitasking smoothly.
About.slide3_desc: Dedicated DDoS protection Firewall system. Weekly automatic Backup mechanism ensures absolute safety for your data.
About.slide4_desc: Friendly Web-based interface, allowing Start/Stop/Reboot server, OS Reinstall, or instant configuration upgrade with just a few clicks.

Page.feat_speed_desc: System uses 100% NVMe Enterprise SSDs and modern CPUs, ensuring smoothest handling of heavy tasks.
Page.feat_security_desc: Hardware combined with software Firewall effectively prevents DDoS attacks and unauthorized intrusions.
Page.feat_network_desc: Uplink network port up to 10Gbps domestic and international, ensuring stable transmission, no congestion during peak hours.
Page.feat_backup_desc: Data is backed up periodically weekly and stored in 2 different locations to ensure absolute safety.
Page.feat_virtualization_desc: Advanced virtualization technology ensures resources (RAM, CPU) are dedicated, not shared with other users.
Page.feat_upgrade_desc: Easily upgrade configuration (Scale Up) CPU, RAM, Disk in just a few minutes without long service interruption.
Page.features_desc: Solid foundation for all your applications, websites, and business systems.
Page.stats_desc: RealtimeCLOUD infrastructure is located at the largest Data Centers in Vietnam (Viettel, VNPT, FPT).

Page.stats_desc: Accompanying the development of over 500+ Vietnamese Startups on their journey to conquer the market.
